panel.title: Queues
panel.description: Manage your queues and let your viewers join them.

queue.header: Create viewer queues, manage them from {LINK_OVERLAY}.
queue.premium_limit:
You created the maximum number of {MAX} queues.
Become premium to create up to {MAX_PREMIUM} queues.
Or disable / delete some queues to create new ones.

form.param_placeholder_tt: Name used in placeholders to display queue information. Example: {QUEUE_1_COUNT} will display the number of viewers in the queue.
form.param_max_per_user_tt: Maximum number of times a user can join the queue.
form.param_max_entries_tt: Maximum number of viewers allowed in the queue. Set to 0 for unlimited.
form.param_enable_in_progress_tt: Enable a separate list for viewers currently being processed. Useful for tracking who's currently playing/participating.
form.list_entries_tt: List of viewers currently waiting in the queue.
form.list_in_progress_tt: List of viewers currently being processed (playing, participating, etc.).
